Text: Little Bitty Pretty One:  Produced by Aladdin Records (located in Los Angeles, Calif.), and featuring The Sharps on backing vocals, Harris' version reached No. 6 on the U.S. "Billboard" Best-Sellers chart and No. 2 on the R&B chart.
